body.raw:
SELECT 'Hello Workers Analytics Engine' AS message
FORMAT TabSeparated

SELECT     
    index1 AS handler,  
    blob1 AS cf_ray,  
    blob2 AS url,  
    blob3 AS rendering_mode,  
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    blob5 as cf_cache_source,
    blob6 as city,
    blob7 as region,
    blob8 as country,
    blob9 as colo,
    blob10 as user_agent,
    double1 as attempt,
    double2 as duration
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' DAY
ORDER BY timestamp
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT
    timestamp,
    index1 as handler,
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    blob1 AS cf_ray,
    blob3 AS rendering_mode,
    blob5 AS cf_cache_source,
    blob9 AS colo,
    double1 AS attempt,
    double2 AS duration
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' HOUR AND
    position('LAC2SNE33734PCM001' IN blob2) > 0
ORDER BY timestamp ASC, cf_ray ASC, handler ASC
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT
    timestamp,
    index1 as handler,
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    blob1 AS cf_ray,
    blob3 AS rendering_mode,
    blob5 AS cf_cache_source,
    blob9 AS colo,
    double1 AS attempt,
    double2 AS duration
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' HOUR AND
    position('LAC2SNE33734PCM001' IN blob2) > 0
ORDER BY timestamp ASC, cf_ray ASC, handler ASC
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT
    double1 AS attempt,
    count() AS value
FROM ssr_cache_p1_v1

WHERE
    timestamp >= toDateTime(1688972456) AND timestamp <= toDateTime(1689075548)
    and ('all' = 'all' OR blob9 IN ('all'))
    and toUInt32(double1) IN (0,1,2,3,4)
    and ('ES' = 'all' OR blob8 in ('ES'))
    and ('all' = 'all' OR blob3 in ('all'))
    and ('all' = 'all' OR blob4 in ('all'))
    and ('all' = 'all' OR blob5 in ('all'))
    and ('all' = 'all' OR blob10 IN('all') OR length(blob10) = 0)
GROUP BY attempt

ORDER BY value DESC
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT
    intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 60) * 300 AS t, 
    index1 as handler,    
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    SUM(_sample_interval) AS requests,
    toUInt32(SUM(_sample_interval * double2) / SUM(_sample_interval)) AS avg_duration
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' HOUR AND handler = 'L3' AND blob3 = 'SSR'
GROUP BY t, handler, cf_cache_status
ORDER BY t, handler, cf_cache_status
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT
    intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 300) * 300 AS t,     
    blob3 AS rendering_mode,  
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    blob5 as cf_cache_source,
    SUM(_sample_interval * double2) / SUM(_sample_interval) AS avg_duration
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' DAY
GROUP BY rendering_mode, t, cf_cache_source, cf_cache_status
ORDER BY t
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT
    (intDiv(toUInt32(timestamp), 20) * 20) * 1000 AS t,
    blob3 AS rendering_mode,  
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    blob5 as cf_cache_source,
    blob9 AS colo,
    double1 AS attempt,
    SUM(_sample_interval * double2) / SUM(_sample_interval) AS avg_duration
FROM ssr_cache_p1_v1
WHERE timestamp >= toDateTime(1688701379) AND timestamp <= toDateTime(1688722979)
GROUP BY t, rendering_mode, cf_cache_status, cf_cache_source, colo, attempt
ORDER BY t
FORMAT JSONEachRow

SELECT    
    index1 as handler,    
    blob4 AS cf_cache_status,
    blob5 AS cf_cache_source,
    SUM(_sample_interval * double2) / SUM(_sample_interval) AS avg_duration,
    COUNT() AS count_ray
FROM {{datasetId}}
WHERE timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1' DAY
GROUP BY handler, cf_cache_status, cf_cache_source
ORDER BY handler, cf_cache_status, cf_cache_source
FORMAT JSONEachRow
